page.title: 08RECREATION, CONTINUED
page.content:
Quite a lot of people go horse riding. Some have their own horse and go to shows & join Pony clubs. A horse needs a field of grass and a stable of straw.You need a saddle,bridle,brushes & a leading rein.
Many people go fishing round here because there are lots of lakes in the fields. People go fishing as their hobby. Some people fish over night & some people go at 4 o'clock in the morning.Fishing is a quiet hobby & you need lots of patience to do it. Shooting & beating are very popular. There are usually eight bush beaters. After a shoot everyone should get a share of the game and a bottle of beer. The beaters have to get sticks and shake all the bushes to get all the animals and birds out.
